pkgmetadata.longdescription: Auxiliary Functions for Phenological Data Analysis // Provides some easy-to-use functions for time series analyses of (plant-) phenological data sets. These functions mainly deal with the estimation of combined phenological time series and are usually wrappers for functions that are already implemented in other R packages adapted to the special structure of phenological data and the needs of phenologists. Some date conversion functions to handle Julian dates are also provided.
